Cell.Data: This language change will only take effect once you have returned to the main menu.

Welcome to Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem!
Here are some useful links:

Official Forums: www.wolcengame.com
Official Discord server: discord.gg/wolcenstudio
Official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/WolcenGame
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/WolcenGame
Follow us on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Wolcen/
Are you sure you want to quit Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem?
Are you sure you want to return to the main menu?
Streamer Mode hides the numbers in your Wolcen tag.
Playing in Story Mode will reduce the challenge of combat encounters, allowing you to focus on playing through the story.
Playing in Normal will keep combat encounters challenging, providing you with the intended Wolcen experience.
Play in Private to play through the game alone or with invited friends.
Play in Public to allow any player matching your level to join your game.
Are you sure you want to change your Difficulty settings? You will return to the Main Menu.
This Game Mode is only available in Normal Difficulty.
Due to a high number of users, we will try to reconnect you automatically in %1s
Are you sure you wish to play Offline?
Show Item type of dropped Items
Rebuild Stormfall as its new Regent. Carry out strategic Operations and bring peace to the world of Wolcen once and for all.\nUnlocked after Chapter IV completion.
Begin your journey through the World of Wolcen in Chapter I of the Story Campaign!
Rule Stormfall and adventure through replayable random content for awesome rewards!
Crowned regent, you must guide Stormfall towards prosperity and strike its enemies with the help of the Purple Phoenix mercenaries.
Are you sure you want to change quests? Progress on your current quest may be lost.

Select this mode to access the original campaign of Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem.\n\nYou will not be able to access the Bloodtrail Chronicle events and rewards, but you will have access to the other gameplay improvements.
You are a Purifier of the Republic, devoted to the destruction of witchcraft in all its forms. Such devotion may become untenable, however, when a dormant power reveals itselfâ¦

Select this mode to access the Bloodtrail Chronicle. The campaign has been adapted to integrate the Bloodtrail event and the endgame narrative content. Prepare for the hunt, follow the trail of your Prey, customize your encounter and face it to earn special Chronicle rewards!
6 months after the events at Crimson Keep, the Order of Oshara has arrived in Stormfall to investigate the disappearance of their Dragon Matriarchâ¦
Displays this help message about the chat commands
<Message> - Sends a message to your party
<WolcenTag> <Message> - Sends a private message to a player
You are playing in online mode
You are playing in offline mode
\n<Font color="#FFFFFF">This choice only impacts your starting weapon and skill. Every playstyle will be available for all characters no matter how they started.</Font>
You must choose a starting weapon before continuing
You will be able to change your playstyle at any time by learning new skills and equipping other weapon types.
âDash into the fray and take down foes from the heart of the battle! Generate rage by hitting enemies and bring down a powerful hammer to crush all that stand in your way.â
"Bring sheer destruction through your mastery of magic. Rain fireballs on your foes and replenish your willpower by finishing the survivors with your staff."
"Riddle your foes with arrows as they desperately try to hit you. Build-up rage by hitting enemies and unleash a deadly volley of arrows to pack even more firepower!"

Click the Left Mouse Button to rotate the character
Click the Middle Mouse Button to rotate the lighting
Pushed to the brink by an ambush, you manifest a strange supernatural power. Hunted by your former comrades, you investigate an occult conspiracy.
Pursuing your sister Valeria, you travel further in the world of Wolcen to retrieve a powerful artifact capable of destroying the Covenant of the Blind.
Infiltrated behind enemy lines, Valeria and you are making a last stand to prevent Ahriman, Fallen Duke of Fury, to rise and pacify all lifeforms.
An unlikely survivor of Crimson Keep, you return to the city of Stormfall with a new ambition; to find the dragon matriarch Oshara before anyone else can.
